references.paper_title: ImageBind: One embedding space to bind them all
references.reason: This paper introduces ImageBind, a foundational model that unifies various modalities into a single embedding space, which is leveraged in this work to improve the model's cross-modality capabilities.

references.paper_title: DAFormer: Improving network architectures and training strategies for domain-adaptive semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper presents DAFormer, a strong baseline for unsupervised domain adaptation in semantic segmentation that this work builds upon and extends to unsupervised modality adaptation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models which are used as the backbone in this work due to their ability to generate high-quality images and adapt to various domains.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces LAION-5B, the large-scale image-text dataset used to pre-train the text-to-image diffusion model, a key component for the proposed modality adaptation method.
This foundational paper on denoising diffusion probabilistic models provides the theoretical basis for the diffusion-based pseudo-label generation method proposed in this work.
